Filter the data

Filter the data to just what you're interested in, and then download the results or create a summary table.

Most people search for loan originations for first-lien, owner-occupied, 1-4 family and manufactured housing in 2012. For your convenience, we have pre-filtered the results to only include those items. Download now or add more filters below. (Or clear all fields.)

Location
State, county, MSA/MD, or census tract information
+ Add another state or MSA/MD

Applicant
Demographics, joint applicants, income levels, and more
  • $,000   to   $,000

Lender
Bank name, regulatory agency, and more

  • Use the FFIEC's disclosure tool to find a lender's ID.

Property
Type of building, size of home, and more

Loan Description
Purpose of the loan, status of the loan, secondary purchaser, & more
  • $,000   to   $,000

Loan Action
Purpose of the loan, status of the loan, secondary purchaser, and more
Clear all fields Want more insight?   Create a summary table

There are many HMDA records from 2007 - 2012 with the above selected filters.
